inclusion.criterion: severe degenerative mitral regurgitation with isolated mid-segment posterior leaflet prolapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mitral leaflet coaptation surface sufficient to reduce mitral regurgitation without undue leaflet tension
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient competent to sign informed consent and able to return for follow-up and is capable of participating in all testing associated with this clinical investigation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: evidence of anterior or bileaflet prolapse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: fragile or thinning apex (e.g. LV aneurysm)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: have undergone cardiac or peripheral vascular procedures within 30 days prior to the trial procedure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: planned cardiac or peripheral vascular procedures within 30 days after the trial procedure
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
